com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The account used by a user once they have logged in or signed up.

    Contains Strings city, email, and a unique username. also has an Inventory, Friends, and TradeHistory Account has getters for all of these and setters for the Strings and Inventories

    See Also:
    , Friends , TradeHistory, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account()
      Constructor for Account creates an empty Inventory and empty Friends
